How it started

Posted on February 1, 2017

It started around January 2015 that I liked to have a wakeup light in my bedroom. I decided to make one with a Raspberry Pi 2 that I had laying around. It was one of my weekend hobby projects. For the light I used a 1.5 to 2 meter white... [Read More]
